fields.question: Hello! This is a satisfaction survey by a Demo Company :)
Have you already received your package?
How long did it take for you to receive the package?
Please, rate in a scale of 1 (worst) to 5 (best) the delivery service
Do you consider that the delivered product is satisfactory? Please, rate your satisfaction level
Do you have any comments regarding the delivery service? If not, please write No:
After your purchase, which of the following products are you more likely to buy in the future?:
How would you rate the reliability of the product, in a scale of 1-5?
Are you interested in receiving more information about the product you selected?
